Thomas Massie says President Trump “flipped” on releasing the Epstein files for two key reasons. posted 6 hours ago by CatalystForChange 2 comments award share report block Shadow of Ezra @ShadowofEzra • 9h Rep. Thomas Massie says President Trump “flipped” on releasing the Epstein files for two key reasons. First, he claims Trump doesn’t want to embarrass his rich and powerful friends who may be tied to Epstein, for personal scandals. Second, Massie hints that some officials may
